text: The Roue's Heart is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithThe Roué’s HeartThe Roue’s Heart and stars Harry Solter, Linda Arvidson, and John R. Cumpson. ==Actors== * Harry Solter as Monsieur Flamant * Linda Arvidson as Noblewoman / Sculptress's Friend * John R. Cumpson as Nobleman * Adele DeGarde as Sculptress's Model * Gladys Egan as Child * Anita Hendrie as Noblewoman * Charles Inslee as Nobleman * Arthur V. Johnson as Nobleman / Servant * Florence Lawrence as Noblewoman * Marion Leonard as Sculptress * David Miles as Nobleman (unconfirmed) * Owen Moore as Nobleman * Barry O'Moore as Nobleman (as Herbert Yost) * Mack Sennett as Servant * Dorothy West as Sculptress's Friend ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: The Roue's Heart
